title: Lynda - Office for Mac 2016 New Features
description:
Lynda - Office for Mac 2016 New Features

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

1h 33m Beginner Jul 09, 2015  | Uploaded in Nov 8, 2015 by 2boweb

Subjects: Business Education + Elearning 
Software: Office Office 365 
Author: David Rivers 

Explore all the features and enhancements in Microsoft's new Lynda - Office for Mac 2016 suite, available now for Office 365 subscribers. This course reviews the modernized interface and other suite-wide enhancements, and then steps through the new features and capabilities in each program. Author David Rivers covers Word's Design tab and cloud collaboration features, Excel's Formula Builder and PivotTable slicers, PowerPoint's Presenter view and new slide transitions, OneNote's addition to the suite, and Outlook's improved Conversation view and preview options.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Exploring the new interface and Ribbon
	â€¢	Working with Word's Design tab
	â€¢	Formatting with the Styles pane
	â€¢	Using Smart Lookup in Excel
	â€¢	Using Excel's Analysis ToolPak
	â€¢	Investigating themes in Word and PowerPoint
	â€¢	Creating and sharing notebooks with OneNote
	â€¢	Viewing email, calendars, and weather in Outlook
